segments.text: Honey , we are all out of wine and cheese . Do you mind running to the deli and picking up a few things ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Can ’ t it wait ? I ’ m watching the game right now !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Your friends and family are coming over tonight and we still need to get a lot of things .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK , pick up some cured meats to go with the wine . Maybe a pound of polish sausages , ham , liverwurst , salami and any other cold cuts that are on sale . I think I saw a promotion for pastrami . Also get s
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Whoa wait a minute ! Isn ’ t that a bit too much ? I mean , how much is all of this going to cost !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Never mind that.Get some dips as well . Get a jar of spinach and blue cheese dip and also some Tzatziki.If they have bean dip get that as well . Last but not least , get some pickles .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Very funny ! Get a move on ! People will be here any minute .
segments.speaker: S1
